alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 2:46PM EDT until April 04 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN MIAMI-DADE COUNTY... At 245 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Royal Palm Ranger, or 8 miles southwest of Homestead General Airport, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Florida City, Royal Palm Ranger and Everglades National Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
